title: Upgraded 1 Bed in Westwood +Stainless Steel Appls +A/C +1 Month Free
posting_body: ['Unit Availability: August 5, 2022', 'Live Video Calls & In-Person Tours Available', '1 MONTH FREE ON', 'A 12 MONTH LEASE', "With a peaceful setting created by ivy-draped walls, interaction-focused lounge areas and a resort-style pool, you'll be surprised to find edgy features hidden throughout the property.", 'Custom graffiti art walls, cabana lounges and sultry color palettes keep the vibe energetic.', 'eight70 proudly mirrors the multidimensional layers of Westwood Village.', 'Located just seconds from the Botanical Gardens and UCLA Campus, as well as countless restaurants and shops, eight70 offers an outstanding Walk Score of 82.', 'The community is surrounding by a bustling neighborhood, yet set in such a way that a retreat from the busy world is always available.', 'Your new life awaits you, at eight70.', 'show contact info', '<URL>/', '<URL>', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '- Quartz Countertops & Backsplashes', '- Gourmet Appliance Package', '- Spacious Walk In Closet(s)', '- Floor to Ceiling Tile Showers', 'Air Conditioning', '- Penthouse Options', '- Double Pane Windows', '- Plank Flooring Throughout', '- Private Balconies and Patios', 'In-Unit Features & Amenities Vary', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', '- Conference & Study Room', '- Brand New Fitness Center', '- Heated Resort-Style Pool', '- Custom Graffiti Art Wall', '- Multiple Elevators', '- Outdoor Cabana Lounges', '- Laundry Facilities & Dry Cleaning', '- Lush Landscaping', 'PET POLICY', 'Pets Welcomed, Additional Fees May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', '870 Hilgard Avenue', 'Westwood, CA', '90024', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.', 'Price and availability are subject to change.']
